description: Business transformation, Performance measuring, Strategic plans, Policy analysis, Engagement, Governance and the federal government's decision-making processes.
full_summary:
Title
----------------
(NPP) Business Support Services
_(APM) Services de soutien aux entreprises_

 Tender Reference
----------------
cb-5082-63451105

 Amendments
------------

* 3 - See [Tender Update 3](#tender-update-3) for details.

 Publications
----------------
 NRCan/ RNCan-5000072288 | [Download](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5082/173692--nrcan-5000072288-npp.pdf) (English)

 Invitation to Tender
----------------------

### Notice Details

• **Publication Date**: April 27, 2023
• **Tender Closing Date**: June 6, 2023, 14:00:00

### Tender Status

This tender has expired.

 Business Description
----------------------

(NPP) Business Support Services tender aims to procure services from a professional service provider to support the Natural Resources Canada department in their business needs. The services should include:

* Planning and change management
* Policy development and analysis
* Performance measurement and strategic planning
* Employee engagement and governance
* Government decision-making process support

 ### Tender Documents

 Please download the complete tender document via the provided link: [Download](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5082/173692--rncan-5000072288-apm.pdf) (English) | (French)

 Delivered Locations
---------------------

The contract will be performed within the National Capital Region (NCR) and across Canada.

 ### Annexes 

 The following annexes are part of this tender document: 

* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR) and Canada

 Delivery Dates
----------------

The expected contract start date is June 12, 2023, and the expected contract end date is March 31, 2024.

 Contact Information
---------------------

To inquire about this tender, please contact Kaeli McCarthy at
[kaeli.mccarthy@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:kaeli.mccarthy@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
 or call (343) 571-9878.

 Affidavit of Commercial Neutrality
----------------------------------

 This tender is subject to the Government Contracts Act. Suppliers are advised to review the Trade Agreement sections referenced in [1.7](#17-trade-agreements-and-awmd-c
